name: Larry The Unlucky Part 1
description:
Discover Larry's life, his habits and how his unluckiness affects the lives of others.
Explore the different stories, find clues, open locked places and enjoy because this is just the beginning of Larry's life.
Can you help him escape from all the difficult situations he has to face?

Features:
  • Point and click escape room game
  • Play to unravel an intriguing story
  • Find hidden objects and solve different puzzles to progress
  • Supporting 4 different languages
